attributes.action: Age Limit On Spray Paint purchase to stop grafitti tagging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why Does the government waste millions each year on cleaning up grafitti when the answer is right there to cut it down or even put a stop to it i for one am sick of taggers spray painting anything and everything in the country the government spends millions on it to be cleaned up then they do it again why dont you introduce an age limit of which you can buy spray paint like 18 for example realisticlly anyone under the age of 18 is never going to need it realisticlly so why not inforce an age limit the government is going to benifit by saving money on cleaning up and makes money if anyone sells it to people under the age of 18 by fining them the way i see it its a win win situation for the government and please dont get me wrong to all the people that actually do art from grafitti i think what you guys do is brilliant and amazing but a line has to be drawn somewhere there are plenty of grifitti areas where it can be done under super vision im all for this and feel that it should be allowed but tagging is wrong in there own way but im sick of looking at a wall which has a tag on it a lamp post a phone box lets get this under control before its to late and start investing into what really needs it schools hospitals etc

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
